page.title: 03BROUGHTON
page.content: THERE IS NO SUCH PLACE AS THE{VILLAGE OF BROUGHTON.THE{PARISH}OF BROUGHTON IS COMPRISED OF BROUGHTON CHURCH AND BROUGHTON HALL AND THE SCATTERED HAMLETS OF FAIR OAK,WETWOOD,CHARNES AND BROMLEY.IT IS ONE OF THE MOST BEAUTIFUL WOODED PASTORAL AREAS TO BE FOUND ANYWHERE IN BRITAIN.IT IS RICH IN LOCAL HISTORY AND FOLKLORE.ITS PEOPLE ARE NOWADAYS A MIXTURE OF OLD,LONG ESTABLISHED FAMILIES AND THOSE WHO HAVE CHOSEN OUR AREA IN WHICH TO LIVE AND ENJOY ITS BEAUTY.THE WHOLE AREA IS WITHIN THE GREEN BELT AND THEREFORE NO RIBBON BUILDING IS PERMITTED THUS PRESERVING MUCH OF ITS PEACE AND TRANQUILLITY.THE MAIN OCCUPATION OF THE LOCAL PEOPLE IS FARMING ALTHOUGH SOME YOUNG PEOPLE AND MOST OF THE INCOMERS COMMUTE TO THE SURROUNDING TOWNS.IT IS A CLOSELY KNIT,FRIENDLY COMMUNITY.
